description: This file provides the implementation of a CCSP CWMP TCP Connection Request Handler object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions. It manages internal components such as a worker thread and defines object behaviors for handling TCP connection requests within the CCSP framework.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CcspCwmpTcpcrhoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new CCSP CWMP TCP Connection Request Handler object, setting up function pointers and internal state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the object, freeing associated resources including worker threads.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls necessary subordinate objects, particularly the worker component for handling asynchronous operations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Performs initialization of the object, setting default property values and function pointers.
